text: Back in 2011, Kate Middleton's sister, Pippa, became the world's most famous maid of honor when she attended to the Duchess of Cambridge during her wedding to Prince William. Although British weddings don't traditionally have maids of honor ( instead, there's a ` ` chief bridesmaid'' ), Kate broke custom to have her sibling by her side on her big day. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below So who will be Meghan Markle's Pippa on May 19? No one, actually. Markle will not have a maid of honor at the wedding, since she could not pick one from her close group of friends.
